items.title: 1.1 Gazebo Simulation Fundamentals
items.description: Introduction to Gazebo simulation environment and core concepts for robotics development.

items.title: 1.2 Robot Model Integration in Gazebo
items.description: Import and configure robot models in Gazebo using URDF and SDF formats.

items.title: 1.3 Physics and Sensor Simulation in Gazebo
items.description: Configure physics properties and sensor models for realistic simulation in Gazebo.

items.title: 1.4 Gazebo-ROS2 Integration
items.description: Connect ROS2 nodes to Gazebo simulation environment for hardware-in-the-loop testing.

items.title: Module 2 Capstone Project: Complete Simulation Environment
items.description: Integrate all Module 2 concepts into a comprehensive simulation project with robot, sensors, physics, and ROS2 integration.

items.title: Module 2 Quiz: Robot Simulation with Gazebo
items.description: Test your understanding of Gazebo simulation fundamentals, robot integration, physics, and ROS2 integration.

items.title: Module 2, Week 1: Gazebo Simulation Fundamentals
items.description: Introduction to Gazebo simulation environment and basic concepts

items.title: Module 2, Week 2: Robot Model Integration
items.description: Learn how to import and configure robot models in Gazebo simulation environment

items.title: Module 2, Week 3: Physics and Sensor Simulation
items.description: Understanding physics engines and sensor models in Gazebo simulation environment

items.title: Module 2, Week 4: ROS2 Integration
items.description: Connecting ROS2 nodes to Gazebo simulation environment for hardware-in-the-loop testing

items.title: Module 2: Robot Simulation with Gazebo
items.description: Learn robot simulation using Gazebo, including model integration, physics simulation, and ROS2 integration

items.title: Week 1 Exercises: Gazebo Simulation Fundamentals
items.description: Practical exercises to reinforce understanding of Gazebo simulation fundamentals.

items.title: Week 2 Exercises: Robot Model Integration
items.description: Practical exercises to reinforce understanding of robot model integration in Gazebo.

items.title: Week 3 Exercises: Physics and Sensor Simulation
items.description: Practical exercises to reinforce understanding of physics and sensor simulation in Gazebo.

items.title: Week 4 Exercises: Gazebo-ROS2 Integration
items.description: Practical exercises to reinforce understanding of Gazebo-ROS2 integration for hardware-in-the-loop testing.
